1bbad006e7b1c8b414478427d33de47c5600af3c748f108da","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://2c3d0973630ed74f2b5ce3944677a885dc70ec32fc83b35f55045a10224da32b","dweb:/ipfs/QmbefZ5RoEZKNHXCALfh683PnaNYzKPcKMFjyY1DVAgq8A"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts-v4.4/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc3d946432c0ddbb1f846a0d3985be71299df331b91d06732152117f62f0be2b5","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4632c341a06ba5c079b51ca5a915efab4e6ab57735b37839b3e8365ff806a43e","dweb:/ipfs/QmTHT3xHYed2wajEoA5qu7ii2BxLpPhQZHwAhtLK5Z7ANK"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts-v4.4/token/ERC721/IERC721.sol":{"keccak256":"0x516a22876c1fab47f49b1bc22b4614491cd05338af8bd2e7b382da090a079990","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a439187f7126d31add4557f82d8aed6be0162007cd7182c48fd934dbab8f3849","dweb:/ipfs/QmRPLguRFvrRJS7r6F1bcLvsx6q1VrgjEpZafyeL8D7xZh"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts-v4.4/utils/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0x51b758a8815ecc9596c66c37d56b1d33883a444631a3f916b9fe65cb863ef7c4","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://997ca03557985b3c6f9143a18b6c3a710b3bc1c7f189ee956d305a966ecfb922","dweb:/ipfs/QmQaD3Wb62F88SHqmpLttvF6wKuPDQep2LLUcKPekeRzvz"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts-v4.4/utils/introspection/ERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd10975de010d89fd1c78dc5e8a9a7e7f496198085c151648f20cba166b32582b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fb0048dee081f6fffa5f74afc3fb328483c2a30504e94a0ddd2a5114d731ec4d","dweb:/ipfs/QmZptt1nmYoA5SgjwnSgWqgUSDgm4q52Yos3xhnMv3MV43"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts-v4.4/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x447a5f3ddc18419d41ff92b3773fb86471b1db25773e07f877f548918a185bf1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://be161e54f24e5c6fae81a12db1a8ae87bc5ae1b0ddc805d82a1440a68455088f","dweb:/ipfs/QmP7C3CHdY9urF4dEMb9wmsp1wMxHF6nhA2yQE5SKiPAdy"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts-v4.4/utils/math/Math.sol":{"keccak256":"0xfaad496c1c944b6259b7dc70b4865eb1775d6402bc0c81b38a0b24d9f525ae37","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://2f60ddc4639589b1d7a87cd647561be4c71ddf9a9dcf55f38db75e24ef1f6c5b","dweb:/ipfs/QmTocvyQx3DPrzsFePtrhDGM6eYxUh3v8iBN3D59yoeuBt"]}},"version":1}

params._maxBurnAmountPerRunBasisPoints: Max burn amount per single run
params._totalCoverSharesBurnt: Shares burnt counter init value (cover case)
params._totalNonCoverSharesBurnt: Shares burnt counter init value (non-cover case)
params._treasury: the Lido treasury address (see StETH/ERC20/ERC721-recovery interfaces)

requestBurnMyStETH(uint256).details: only `voting` allowed to call this function. Transfers `_stETH2Burn` stETH tokens from the message sender and irreversibly locks these on the burner contract address. Internally converts `_stETH2Burn` amount into underlying shares amount (`_stETH2BurnAsShares`) and marks the converted amount for burning by increasing the `nonCoverSharesBurnRequested` counter.

requestBurnMyStETHForCover(uint256).details: only `voting` allowed to call this function. Transfers `_stETH2Burn` stETH tokens from the message sender and irreversibly locks these on the burner contract address. Internally converts `_stETH2Burn` amount into underlying shares amount (`_stETH2BurnAsShares`) and marks the converted amount for burning by increasing the `coverSharesBurnRequested` counter.

setBurnAmountPerRunQuota(uint256).details: only `voting` allowed to call this function.

params._maxBurnAmountPerRunBasisPoints: a fraction expressed in basis points (taken from Lido.totalSharesAmount)

getBurnAmountPerRunQuota().notice: Returns the max amount of shares allowed to burn per single run

getCoverSharesBurnt().notice: Returns the total cover shares ever burnt.

getExcessStETH().notice: Returns the stETH amount belonging to the burner contract address but not marked for burning.

getNonCoverSharesBurnt().notice: Returns the total non-cover shares ever burnt.

processLidoOracleReport(uint256,uint256,.notice: Enacts cover/non-cover burning requests and logs cover/non-cover shares amount just burnt. Increments `totalCoverSharesBurnt` and `totalNonCoverSharesBurnt` counters. Resets `coverSharesBurnRequested` and `nonCoverSharesBurnRequested` counters to zero. Does nothing if there are no pending burning requests.

recoverERC20(address,uint256).notice: Transfers a given `_amount` of an ERC20-token (defined by the `_token` contract address) currently belonging to the burner contract address to the Lido treasury address.

recoverERC721(address,uint256).notice: Transfers a given token_id of an ERC721-compatible NFT (defined by the token contract address) currently belonging to the burner contract address to the Lido treasury address.

recoverExcessStETH().notice: Transfers the excess stETH amount (e.g. belonging to the burner contract address but not marked for burning) to the Lido treasury address set upon the contract construction.

requestBurnMyStETH(uint256).notice: BE CAREFUL, the provided stETH will be burnt permanently.

requestBurnMyStETHForCover(uint256).notice: BE CAREFUL, the provided stETH will be burnt permanently.

setBurnAmountPerRunQuota(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum amount of shares allowed to burn per single run (quota).

documentation.text:
@notice Gets authorized oracle address
 @return address of oracle contract.

@notice Get shares amount of the provided account
 @param _account provided account address.
@notice Get total amount of shares in existence

@title Interface defining a Lido liquid staking pool
 @dev see also [Lido liquid staking pool core contract](https://docs.lido.fi/contracts/lido)

@notice Gets currently set beacon report receiver
 @return address of a beacon receiver
@title Interface for the Lido Beacon Chain Oracle
Emitted when a new single burn quota is set
Emitted when a new stETH burning request is added by the `requestedBy` address.
Emitted when the stETH `amount` (corresponding to `sharesAmount` shares) burnt for the `isCover` reason.

Emitted when the excessive stETH `amount` (corresponding to `sharesAmount` shares) recovered (i.e. transferred)
 to the Lido treasure address by `requestedBy` sender.

Emitted when the ERC20 `token` recovered (i.e. transferred)
 to the Lido treasure address by `requestedBy` sender.

Emitted when the ERC721-compatible `token` (NFT) recovered (i.e. transferred)
 to the Lido treasure address by `requestedBy` sender.

Transfers the excess stETH amount (e.g. belonging to the burner contract address
 but not marked for burning) to the Lido treasury address set upon the
 contract construction.
Intentionally deny incoming ether

statements.documentation:
Allow invocation only from `LidoOracle` or previously set composite beacon report receiver.
 The second condition provides a way to use multiple callbacks packed into a single composite container.

documentation.text:
Enacts cover/non-cover burning requests and logs cover/non-cover shares amount just burnt.
 Increments `totalCoverSharesBurnt` and `totalNonCoverSharesBurnt` counters.
 Resets `coverSharesBurnRequested` and `nonCoverSharesBurnRequested` counters to zero.
 Does nothing if there are no pending burning requests.
Returns the total cover shares ever burnt.
Returns the total non-cover shares ever burnt.
Returns the max amount of shares allowed to burn per single run
Returns the stETH amount belonging to the burner contract address but not marked for burning.
